Attached is the Addendum to the Original Licensing Study Report for the above

questions. In the event that I am not available and you need to speak to someone
immediately, please contact the local office at (269) 337-5289.
FOR CDC ONLY
Per MCL 722.113g, this report must be filed in your licensing notebook.
Sincerely,
Rorie Dodge-Garnaat, Licensing Consultant
